title: (Dis)Honesty: The Truth About Lies (2015)
overview: A documentary about why people lie. Includes profiles with famous liars.
storyline: From ticket-fixing in our police departments to test-score scandals in our schools, from our elected leaders' extra-marital affairs to financial schemes undermining our economy, dishonesty seems to be a ubiquitous part of the news. But it's not just true in the headlines - we ALL cheat.
